thread.title: Brazilians divided as Lula could head to prison

title: Brazilians divided as Lula could head to prison
text:
Brazilians divided as Lula could head to prison 5:56pm BST - 01:37 
Brazil’s Supreme Court early on Thursday rejected former president Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s plea to avoid prison while he appeals a corruption conviction, in a vote that likely ends his political career and deepens divisions in the country.   
Brazil’s Supreme Court early on Thursday rejected former president Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s plea to avoid prison while he appeals a corruption conviction, in a vote that likely ends his political career and deepens divisions in the country.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/04/05/brazilians-divided-as-lula-could-head-to?videoId=415141053&videoChannel=13422
